title: List of all Android app for  books libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android app for  books libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-library-app
repoList.description: Developing and library application for searching books and renting the books using mobile application

repoList.name: My-Personal-Library
repoList.description: Android App for managing your books

repoList.name: librarything-browser
repoList.description: Android app for browsing and searching your LT books offline

repoList.name: MyLibrary_Android_Application
repoList.description: This is an Android application which allows the user to manage his personal library. The goal is to be able to look for books information thanks to the Google Book API and then be able to add this book to our personal library on this app. Then the user can update an added books to put his personal rate, and his own point a view about it for example. I'm using Google Sign in API to connect to the app, Google Book API to find information about a book entered by the user, Retrofit to deal with the JSON file sent by the API and I use a SQLite database

repoList.name: Library
repoList.description: Android app for keep books organized, using room data base

repoList.name: android-booksearch
repoList.description: Book search app for Open library

repoList.name: booksunam-app-android
repoList.description: Application for libraries of  the UNAM

repoList.name: MyLibrary
repoList.description: A simple Android app for managing books and reading lists.

repoList.name: android-library
repoList.description: An android app managing a list of books for an academic exam

repoList.name: Android-PyCoLib
repoList.description: Android App for Python Library Books
